nodes.text: Although we always travel with epipens in case our fiveryearold peanut & tree nut allergic child needs them,
atraveller(426): Although we always travel with epipens in case our fiveryearold peanut & tree nut allergic child needs them,
Annot: Although we always travel with epipens in case our fiveryearold peanut & tree nut allergic child needs them,
I think having some on board is a good idea,
atraveller(426): I think having some on board is a good idea,
Annot: I think having some on board is a good idea,
as long as crew are trained in the proper usage.
atraveller(426): as long as crew are trained in the proper usage.
Annot: as long as crew are trained in the proper usage.
Moreover, I think the crew need training on how to respectfully treat people with allergies or disabilities.
atraveller(426): Moreover, I think the crew need training on how to respectfully treat people with allergies or disabilities.
Annot: Moreover, I think the crew need training on how to respectfully treat people with allergies or disabilities.

Since our son was diagnosed with the allergy one year ago, we have travelled several times on multiple carriers and have found the foreign carriers to be far less worrisome for those with nut allergies.

atraveller(426): Since our son was diagnosed with the allergy one year ago, we have travelled several times on multiple carriers and have found the foreign carriers to be far less worrisome for those with nut allergies.

Annot: Since our son was diagnosed with the allergy one year ago, we have travelled several times on multiple carriers and have found the foreign carriers to be far less worrisome for those with nut allergies.
In fact, none of the foreign carriers we used during that time even served nuts in economy.
atraveller(426): In fact, none of the foreign carriers we used during that time even served nuts in economy.
Annot: In fact, none of the foreign carriers we used during that time even served nuts in economy.
Our only trouble came with Delta.
atraveller(426): Our only trouble came with Delta.
Annot: Our only trouble came with Delta.
On flights to and from Atlanta to El Salvador, I requested a nutfree buffer zone as listed as an option on the Delta website.
atraveller(426): On flights to and from Atlanta to El Salvador, I requested a nutfree buffer zone as listed as an option on the Delta website.
Annot: On flights to and from Atlanta to El Salvador, I requested a nutfree buffer zone as listed as an option on the Delta website.
This request was not observed on either flight,
atraveller(426): This request was not observed on either flight,
Annot: This request was not observed on either flight,
and I when mentioned it to the cabin crew on one segment, they began taking back the nuts from the passengers around us, pointing out that they couldn't have it because "that little boy is allergic."

atraveller(426): and I when mentioned it to the cabin crew on one segment, they began taking back the nuts from the passengers around us, pointing out that they couldn't have it because "that little boy is allergic."

Annot: and I when mentioned it to the cabin crew on one segment, they began taking back the nuts from the passengers around us, pointing out that they couldn't have it because "that little boy is allergic."
This made us very uncomfortable, but at least the other passengers were polite about it.
atraveller(426): This made us very uncomfortable, but at least the other passengers were polite about it.
Annot: This made us very uncomfortable, but at least the other passengers were polite about it.
I find it amazing that people get so incensed about "their rights" to have nuts being infringed upon.
atraveller(426): I find it amazing that people get so incensed about "their rights" to have nuts being infringed upon.
Annot: I find it amazing that people get so incensed about "their rights" to have nuts being infringed upon.
I have a feeling that these are the same people who would be the first to complain when a plane has to make an emergency landing when a nutallergic passenger goes into anaphylaxis.
atraveller(426): I have a feeling that these are the same people who would be the first to complain when a plane has to make an emergency landing when a nutallergic passenger goes into anaphylaxis.
Annot: I have a feeling that these are the same people who would be the first to complain when a plane has to make an emergency landing when a nutallergic passenger goes into anaphylaxis.
You are partly right.
JJMurray(365): You are partly right.
Annot: You are partly right.

I would be upset if we had to make an emergency landing because someone did not take the proper precautions when they have a serious allergy and thus caused a hundred plus other people to have a major delay.

JJMurray(365): I would be upset if we had to make an emergency landing because someone did not take the proper precautions when they have a serious allergy and thus caused a hundred plus other people to have a major delay.

Annot: I would be upset if we had to make an emergency landing because someone did not take the proper precautions when they have a serious allergy and thus caused a hundred plus other people to have a major delay.
